H0.text: book series about the end of the world. The Passage

H1.text: book series about the end of the world. The Road

H2.text: book series about the end of the world. The Earth Abides

H3.text: book series about the end of the world. Left Behind

A4.text: The Road is a 2006 post-apocalyptic novel by American writer Cormac McCarthy.

A5.text: The book was adapted into a film of the same name in 2009, directed by John Hillcoat, and a comic book in 2024, illustrated by Manu Larcenet.
